name: df-pm2mp
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5
body: |- wceq(cpm2mp, cmpo(s0, s1, cfn, universe, cmpt(s2, cfv(cbs, co(cv(s0), cmat, cfv(cpl1, cv(s1)))), csb(s3, co(cv(s0), cmat, cv(s1)), csb(s4, cfv(cpl1, cv(s3)), co(cv(s4), cgsu, cmpt(s5, cn0, co(co(cv(s2), cdecpmat, cv(s5)), cfv(cvsca, cv(s4)), co(cv(s5), cfv(cmg, cfv(cmgp, cv(s4))), cfv(cv1, cv(s3)))))))))))
bodyPretty: ‚ä¢ pMatToMatPoly =(s0 ‚àà Fin, s1 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶(s2 ‚àà(Base `(s0[Mat](Poly1 ` s1)))‚Ü¶[(s0[Mat]s1)/ s3][(Poly1 ` s3)/ s4](s4[gsum](s5 ‚àà ‚Ñï0 ‚Ü¶((s2[decompPMat]s5)[(√ó ` s4)](s5[(.g `(mulGrp ` s4))](var1 ` s3)))))))
comment: Transformation of a polynomial matrix (over a ring) into a polynomial over matrices (over the same ring). (Contributed by AV, 5-Dec-2019.)
